alert.note: Alert for Carter; Johnson; Sullivan; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 1:24PM CST until January 12 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EST FOR CENTRAL SULLIVAN...NORTHEASTERN UNICOI...JOHNSON...CARTER... SOUTHEASTERN SCOTT AND WASHINGTON COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF BRISTOL... At 224 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Walnut Hill to near Hampton to 8 miles northwest of Bakersville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Elizabethton, Abingdon, Mountain City, Central, Pine Crest, Walnut Hill and Hampton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 25 and 28. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 68 and 75. Interstate 81 in Virginia between mile markers 1 and 33. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
